response.summary: Infrastructure professional with over 5 years of experience designing, implementing and managing software solutions. Proficient in a wide range of AWS services, including IaC, Serverless and Instance-based. Experienced in automating infrastructure deployments and optimizing system performance. Strong communication, analytical, problem-solving and fast-learning skills, with the ability to adapt to changing environments and work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions that meet business needs.
response.skills: Azure Synapse Analytics, PySpark, AWS EC2, AWS EKS, Liderazgo de equipos, AWS CodePipeline, AWS IoT, AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), AWS CloudFront, AWS DynamoDB, AWS CloudWatch, Flutter, AWS Serverless Application Model (AWS SAM), AWS CloudFormation, AWS Cognito, AWS Lambda, AWS SAM, JMeter, Android Studio, Next.js

profile_positions.description:
Working for IT department of Engineering Faculty.

• Maintaining and supporting the infrastructure for over 80 services deployed on AWS EC2 instances, four on-premise servers managed with Proxmox (LXC and KVM), and a local K8s cluster running Rancher with Helm charts.
• Deploying and managing EKS, Helm charts, VPC, EC2, ELB, RDS, DocumentDB and S3, some of them using Terraform.
• Managing access control and privilege escalation, including the implementation of RBAC, IAM, and SSH key management.
• Led a Nest.js developer to implement features, refactor code, maintain and provide support for two microservice applications.
profile_positions.title: Infrastructure Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the ferronickel smelting company Cerro Matoso S.A..

• Deployed an Azure Synapse Analytics Pipeline to schedule hourly executions of the forecasting models previously integrated to achieve an almost real-time forecasting of furnaces’ behavior and helping the furnaces control-team on decision-making.
• Optimized data collection from Azure Data Lake Storage, reducing pipeline execution time by 67% for three months time-windows.
profile_positions.title: Software engineer

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the ferronickel smelting company Cerro Matoso S.A..

• Developed and built a package to deploy four Tensorflow Keras models to forecast temperatures and health of two furnaces.
• Collecting and processing two-year time-series data of 542 variables stored in Azure Data Lake Storage using PySpark.
• Executing machine learning models with collected data and storing models results into Apache Spark Pools.
• Developed an UI based on notebook widgets to perform Forecasting and Simulation on Azure Synapse Analytics notebooks.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de software

profile_positions.description:
• Appropriated the software of ActSell, a system of micro-market smart machines, composed of two Flutter mobile apps, a React web app hosted on EC2, a backend on AWS Lambda, Cognito, DynamoDB, RDS and IoT Core for machines' high level architecture.
• Developed SAM and CloudFormation templates to streamline deployments, improving web app deployments onto CloudFront and S3 with CodePipeline, centralizing data persistence into DynamoDB and integrating Amplify on Flutter for Cognito authentication.
• Led a team of two developers (Flutter and Python) to develop features, optimize performance, refactor and document code.
• Optimized AWS costs in 1400% by monitoring, forecasting and simulating different scenarios in Cost Management tools.
profile_positions.title: Technical leader

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the Mobility Secretariat of Bogotá D.C.

• Developed a web application (Django) to manage and visualize projects planning schedules and overlaps.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the Mobility Secretariat of Bogotá D.C.

• Designed the architecture for VUS (Ventanilla Única de Servicios) an application to manage transit-related services in Bogotá D.C. 
• Followed the TOGAF framework across the domains of Business, Data, Application, Technology, Interoperability and Security.
• Described Secretariat requirements through AS-IS and TO-BE ArchiMate diagrams, Gaps Analysis Matrix FRs, NFRs and SLAs.
profile_positions.title: Business Architect

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the ferronickel smelting company Cerro Matoso S.A..

• Cleaned and pre-processed a five-year historical dataset with 1.180 variables with Pandas, transforming into 49 relevant features.
• Built RNN models for temperature forecasting, based on the processed dataset using Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow Keras.
• Designed and developed a web application (Python Flask) to monitor furnace status and integrated the model to simulate changes.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Researcher and Software Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Trained and tested ANN models of functions as FFT and Image filters to be setted up in FPGAs applying approximate computing.
• Created datasets of functions and built MLP TensorFlow Keras models, optimizing processing time over precision.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Involved in a project with the Planning Secretariat of Bogotá D.C.

• Implemented modules of Bogotá Rural, an Information System for planning and tracking of rural development in Bogotá D.C., for the Planning Secretariat, developing modules using Vue.js, Spring Boot and Oracle RDBMS.
• Integrated ArcGIS applications with the system to show indicators, land-use planning and reports of management.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Implemented 3SC4L4, an application to diagnose Corporate Social Responsibility and promote Sustainable Development Goals.
• Developed using Next.js, Python Flask RestX and MongoDB, integrating Nginx, deployed environments in GCP instances.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de software

profile_positions.description:
• Built a solution to check and track the status of 19.500 pieces of the Bogotá street furniture with image evidence.
• Developed a mobile application using Android Studio to collect data and pictures and send it to an on-premise server through a REST API developed with Python Flask and storing data into a MongoDB instance for later analysis and reporting.
• Implemented automatic PDF reports creation and synchronization to Google Drive using Python.
• Performed load testing with JMeter to ensure availability and concurrency for a total of 1.320 reviews with its images from 22 users
profile_positions.title: Software Development Engineer
